Package xyz.gamars.game.entity.entities

Class BulletEntity

java.lang.Object
xyz.gamars.game.entity.Entity
xyz.gamars.game.entity.entities.BulletEntity
All Implemented Interfaces:
IExpireable, IUpdating
public class BulletEntity extends Entity implements IUpdating, IExpireable
Represents a bullet entity in the game. Bullets are fired by players and enemies and move in a straight line until they collide with an obstacle or expire
Author:
Daryan, Vishak, Sai

    • BulletEntity

      public BulletEntity(int worldX, int worldY, EntityDirection entityDirection) throws IOException
      Constructs an Entity with specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      worldX - The initial worldX-coordinate of the entity in the world.
      worldY - The initial worldY-coordinate of the entity in the world.
      Throws:
      IOException

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the position and lifespan of the bullet entity. Moves the bullet according to its firing direction and decrements its lifespan. If the lifespan reaches zero, the bullet expires and is removed from the game.
      Specified by:
      update in interface IUpdating

    • die

      public void die()
      Removes the bullet entity from the game.
      Specified by:
      die in interface IExpireable

    • getLifespan

      public int getLifespan()
      Gets the remaining lifespan of the bullet entity
      Specified by:
      getLifespan in interface IExpireable
      Returns:
      The remaining lifespan of the bullet entity in frames

    • handleCollisions

      public void handleCollisions()
      Checks if the bullet entity is colliding with any other entities or non-collidable tiles in the game
      Overrides:
      handleCollisions in class Entity

      A string representation of the BulletEntity.
